name: ripple-keypairs

scripts.lint: if ! [ -f eslintrc ]; then curl -o eslintrc 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ripple/javascript-style-guide/es6/eslintrc'; echo 'parser: babel-eslint' >> eslintrc; fi; eslint -c eslintrc src/*.js test/*.js
scripts.prepublish: npm test && npm run lint && npm run compile
